entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
